com.androidanimator.animation

Class ParallelAnimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.androidanimator.animation.Animation
      • com.androidanimator.animation.ParallelAnimator

  • public class ParallelAnimator
extends Animation
    This class allows multiple Combinable objects to be animated in parallel.
    Author:
    SiYao

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public ParallelAnimator add(Combinable combinable)
        This method adds this Combinable object to an ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        combinable - The Animation object that implements the Combinable interface and is allowed to animate with other animations.
        Returns:
        This object, allowing calls to methods in this class to be chained.

      • animate

        public void animate()
        This method gets the ArrayList, sets any parameters if needed and plays all animations in parallel.
        Specified by:
        animate in class Animation

      • getInterpolator

        public TimeInterpolator getInterpolator()
        Returns:
        The interpolator of the entire parallel animation.

      • setInterpolator

        public ParallelAnimator setInterpolator(TimeInterpolator interpolator)
        This method overrides the setInterpolator() methods of all the parallel animations.
        Parameters:
        interpolator - The interpolator of the entire parallel animation to set.

      • getDuration

        public long getDuration()
        Returns:
        The duration of the entire parallel animation.

      • setDuration

        public ParallelAnimator setDuration(long duration)
        This method overrides the setDuration() methods of all the parallel animations.
        Parameters:
        duration - The duration of the entire parallel animation to set.

      • getListener

        public ParallelAnimatorListener getListener()
        Returns:
        The listener for the end of the parallel animation.

      • setListener

        public ParallelAnimator setListener(ParallelAnimatorListener listener)
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to set for the end of the parallel animation.
